channel.title: Models on Brian Plancher
channel.description: Recent content in Models on Brian Plancher

item.title: Workshop on Leveraging Models for Contact-Rich Manipulation
item.description: The objective of this workshop is to bring together researchers in the model-based manipulation community to present their work and review state-of-the art methods in the field. In conjunction, the workshop aims to facilitate discussions on the future of the field and ask several important questions: how can we synthesize model-based approaches and recent learning approaches into a coherent whole? Do we believe that there is structure we can leverage from the models that we use to better inform planning and control algorithms?
